Name: Null Threshold Validator
Function: Flags columns or rows that exceed a % null threshold.

Name: Unique Column Validator
Function: Checks for columns expected to be unique (e.g., IDs).

Name: Outlier Detector
Function: Flags statistical outliers in numeric fields.

Name: Duplicate Row Identifier
Function: Detects fully or partially duplicated rows.

Name: Range Validator
Function: Validates that numeric values fall within expected bounds.

Name: Pattern Validator
Function: Ensures string columns match regex (e.g., email, phone).

Name: Type Enforcement Checker
Function: Confirms actual types match declared/expected types.

Name: Cross-Column Logic Validator
Function: Checks dependencies like 'if A then B must be X'.

Name: Foreign Key Validator
Function: Verifies referenced values exist in related datasets.

Name: Validation Report Generator
Function: Outputs a human-readable or machine-parsable validation summary.
